name: HELP I LOST MY PHONE AND I HAVE CLASS IN A FEW MINUTES SIMULATOR
name_original: HELP I LOST MY PHONE AND I HAVE CLASS IN A FEW MINUTES SIMULATOR
description:
PREMISE

After a night of partying in Taft, it's time to clean up. But wait. It's 9 AM. Almost time for your GD class to start! Due to your lack of responsibility, you're late for class and you've lost your things. Can you find it all in time?

GAMEPLAY

Everything is randomly placed! 

Good luck speedrunning this because every object in this room is randomly placed!

You can throw things around.

FAQ

Q. Is there COVID in this universe?

A. NO.

Created by: Jacob Darvin, Alfred Oliquino, Joshua Ranjo, Victor Tulabot
